    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Movimientos en el plano</string>
            <string language="en">Movements on the plane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegungen auf der Fläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvements sur l'avion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimentos no plano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimenti sull'aereo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακινήσεις στο αεροπλάνο</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los movimientos en el plano. Se estudian las propiedades de cada transformación, la composición de los movimientos y la relación entre ellos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study movements on the plane: the properties of each type of transformation, the composition of movements and the relation among them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">movimientos</string>
            <string language="en">movements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">giro</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">traslación</string>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">giro simetría</string>
            <string language="en">rotation symmetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">transformación</string>
            <string language="en">transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Bewegungen auf der Fläche zu studieren: die 
Eigenschaften jedes Typen Transformation, des Aufbaus der Bewegungen 
und der Relation unter ihnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier des mouvements sur l'avion : les 
propriétés de chaque type de transformation, de composition des 
mouvements et de la relation parmi eux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
movimentos no plano: as propriedades de cada tipo de 
transformação, da composição dos movimentos e da relação entre 
eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare i movimenti sull'aereo: le proprietà di ogni tipo di 
trasformazione, della composizione dei movimenti e del rapporto fra 
loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στις μετακινήσεις μελέτης στο αεροπλάνο: οι ιδιότητες κάθε 
τύπου μετασχηματισμού, της σύνθεσης των μετακινήσεων και της 
σχέσης μεταξύ τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
